page.title: 08THE HAND HOTEL,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: {The Hand Hotel}is situated in Church Street,Llangollen.It was first built as a{Coaching Inn}in{1700,}the oldest part being the present{Royal Oak,}but it has since been added to.The Hotel is now owned by the{Mount Charlotte group.The Hotel is a 3 star hotel with 60 bedrooms.The cost of a single room is{Â£25.00,}and{Â£42.50}for a double. There are{35 full time}and{6 or 7 {part-time staff,}including{6 {chefs.}The capacity of the Hotel is 104 when the hotel is fully booked, and they are virtually fully booked from May to September.The busiest nights in the bar are Friday and Saturday nights.The Hotel has had some famous visitors in the past like the Duke of Wellington,Angela Rippon, Stratford Johns,The Aga Khan and Leo McKern.
